description:
The battle with Gabriel and Raguel is over, but the transition back into daily life isn`t all smooth sailing.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A démon urat és a hőst összezavarták a mindennapok
Le Roi-démon et le héros remettent en question leur quotidien
Maou to Yuusha, Nichijou ni Madou
The Devil and the Hero Question Their Daily Routine
魔王と勇者, 日常に惑う
